New Class Royal Ministries

Called for Community Influence

About Our Ministry

New Class Royal Ministries is a holistic ministry addressing the spiritual, mental, and physical well-being of individuals and communities. Founded in 2005 by Apostle Noah Mulanga, our ministry has evolved over two decades to serve communities in Zambia and beyond.

Our Mission

Called for Community Influence through the integration of faith, mental health, community development, and education.

Key Ministries

  • REACTS Divine Ministerial College - Training over 400 ministers since 2013
  • Community Health Ministry - Holistic health and wellness programs
  • Trauma Healing & Resilience Building - Supporting communities across Zambia, USA, and Malawi
  • Alcohol & Drug Prevention - Community-focused prevention and rehabilitation
  • Global Resilience Oral Workshop (GROW) - International resilience-building initiative

API Documentation

This Django-based church management system provides comprehensive REST API endpoints for managing all aspects of our ministry operations.

Church Information

Access church details, contact information, and organizational data.

GET/api/core/church-info/
GET/api/core/staff/
GET/api/core/ministries/

Sermons & Teaching

Access our sermon library, series, and educational content.

GET/api/sermons/
GET/api/sermons/series/
GET/api/sermons/featured/

Events & Programs

Manage church events, training programs, and workshops.

GET/api/events/
GET/api/events/upcoming/
POST/api/events/{id}/register/

Prayer Ministry

Community prayer support and request management.

GET/api/prayer/
POST/api/prayer/create/
POST/api/prayer/{id}/pray/

Donations & Giving

Secure donation processing and campaign management.

GET/api/donations/campaigns/
POST/api/donations/

Live Streaming

Online service broadcasting and engagement.

GET/api/livestream/current/
GET/api/livestream/upcoming/

Newsletter

Community communication and updates.

POST/api/newsletter/subscribe/
POST/api/newsletter/unsubscribe/

Authentication

User authentication and member management.

POST/api/auth/login/
POST/api/auth/register/

Technical Features

  • Django REST Framework - Robust API development
  • JWT Authentication - Secure user authentication
  • PostgreSQL Database - Reliable data storage
  • Stripe Integration - Secure payment processing
  • AWS S3 Storage - Scalable media file storage
  • Email Integration - Automated communication
  • API Documentation - Swagger/OpenAPI documentation
